price: ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߘߏ߫ ߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߢߡߊߢߌߣߌ߲ߞߊߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߢߍ߫ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫߸ ߞߊ߬ ߓߊ߲߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߓߊ߲߬ ߏ߬ ߞߏ ߡߊ߬
arabic: قَدۡ سَأَلَهَا قَوۡمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡ ثُمَّ أَصۡبَحُواْ بِهَا كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qad sa-alahā qawmun min qablikum thumma aṣbaḥū bihā kāfirīna
